title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting, embedding and pulling models from a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management and RAG; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for integrating local Ollama models into Rails or Sinatra apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with conversation history, syntax highlighting and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models to Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official CUDA-enabled container images for Ollama with runtime GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and Chroma/Qdrant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for chatting and pulling models from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mixtral, CodeLlama and community fine-tunes.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models to servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app for private or channel-based conversations with Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI copilot sidebar powered by Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.
